name: Constituency Parsing
description: Constituency parsing is the task of breaking a text into sub-phrases, or constituents. Non-terminals in the parse tree are types of phrases, the terminals are the words in the sentence.
expected_inputs: The task expects an input sentence.

examples.sentence: Pierre Vinken died aged 81; immortalised aged 61.
James went to the corner shop to buy some eggs, milk and bread for breakfast.
If you bring $10 with you tomorrow, can you pay for me to eat too?
True self-control is waiting until the movie starts to eat your popcorn.
